subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Corey Pavin said he had no concerns about Tiger Woods’s passion for Ryder Cup play, even if he winds up not choosing Woods for every match in the tournament, which will be held Oct. 1-3 in Wales.
snippet: Corey Pavin said he had no concerns about Tiger Woods’s passion for Ryder Cup play, even if he winds up not choosing Woods for every match in the tournament, which will be held Oct. 1-3 in Wales.
